title: $1850/2BR  Heat Included
app_fee: fee for credit check $25.00 per applicant
posting_body: Clean 2 bedroom apartment on the second floor in a 4 unit building.
Large eat in kitchen with many cabinets; also gas range and refrigerator.
Newly refinished oak hardwood floors in the bedrooms and living room.
Oil heat is included in the rental amount.
Tenant must pay for gas for cooking and hot water, electricity and cable.
Garage for one car and plenty of parking on site.
Located next to the Beechwood Knoll Elementary School.
Also included is a  storage locker in the basement.
There are coin operated washers and dryers on the property.
Please call 774-233-2220 and leave a message.
I will return your call as soon as possible.
